docs.lead_paragraph: Four years after cutting off funding for Planned Parenthood, the state of Texas says it has been able to rebuild its safety net, in what could be a model for Republicans in Congress who hope to defund the nation's largest family planning provider at the national level.

headline.main: Texas Tries to Stitch a Safety Net Without Planned Parenthood
headline.print_headline: Texas Tries to Stitch a Safety Net Without Planned Parenthood

docs.snippet: Four years after cutting off funding for Planned Parenthood, the state of Texas says it has been able to rebuild its safety net, in what could be a model for Republicans in Congress who hope to defund the nation's largest family planning provider at...

docs.lead_paragraph: Rite Aid is giving patients a chance to peek over their doctor's shoulder with genetic tests that help determine the effectiveness of some prescriptions.

headline.main: Rite Aid Adds Prescription Analysis to Genetic Test Lineup
headline.print_headline: Rite Aid Adds Prescription Analysis to Genetic Test Lineup

docs.snippet: Rite Aid is giving patients a chance to peek over their doctor's shoulder with genetic tests that help determine the effectiveness of some prescriptions.

docs.lead_paragraph: Conflicting rulings about whether women should have to cross state lines to obtain an abortion could prompt the Supreme Court to take up its first case on the hot-button social issue since 2007.

headline.main: Justices' Decision Imminent on Whether to Hear Abortion Case
headline.print_headline: Justices' Decision Imminent on Whether to Hear Abortion Case

docs.snippet: Conflicting rulings about whether women should have to cross state lines to obtain an abortion could prompt the Supreme Court to take up its first case on the hot-button social issue since 2007.

headline.main: How Period Trackers Have Changed Girl Culture

docs.abstract: Period trackers are among the most popular apps and have helped change girl culture by allowing girls to be more open about their periods.
docs.snippet: Period trackers are among the most popular apps and have helped change girl culture by allowing girls to be more open about their periods.

docs.lead_paragraph: Only nine countries have achieved a U.N. development goal of reducing the number of women dying before, during or after giving birth by 75 percent since 1990, the United Nations and the World Bank said on Thursday.

headline.main: Maternal Deaths Drop Sharply, but Only Nine Nations Meet U.N. Goal
headline.print_headline: Maternal Deaths Drop Sharply, but Only Nine Nations Meet U.N. Goal

docs.snippet: Only nine countries have achieved a U.N. development goal of reducing the number of women dying before, during or after giving birth by 75 percent since 1990, the United Nations and the World Bank said on Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Today’s husbands and fathers are pulling more of their weight with housework and child care, yet women still do more.

headline.main: Men Do More at Home, but Not as Much as They Think
headline.print_headline: Men Do More at Home; Not as Much as They Think

docs.abstract: The Upshot; surveys find that while men think they do equal amount of household and child care duties as women, they fall short; it is noted that this inequality of time is only evident in homes with children, and most couples without children do equal amount of work around home.
docs.snippet: Today’s husbands and fathers are pulling more of their weight with housework and child care, yet women still do more.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some states are subsidizing medically questionable crisis pregnancy centers, while moving to strip funding from comprehensive health care providers.

headline.main: The Stealth Attack on Abortion Access

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Meaghan Winter accuses unlicensed crisis pregnancy centers of anti-abortion bias that misleads low-income women about their medical options; asserts that states and politicians, who are promoting centers, while fighting to defund licensed providers like Planned Parenthood, are depriving women of equal right to essential health care.
docs.snippet: Some states are subsidizing medically questionable crisis pregnancy centers, while moving to strip funding from comprehensive health care providers.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Says He’s ‘a Better Bet’ (Than Marco Rubio) to Beat Hillary Clinton

docs.abstract: While they largely steered clear of each other in the debate Tuesday, Mr. Bush sounded a more aggressive note against Mr. Rubio the day after, saying he had the proven record needed to beat Hillary Rodham Clinton.
docs.snippet: While they largely steered clear of each other in the debate Tuesday, Mr. Bush sounded a more aggressive note against Mr. Rubio the day after, saying he had the proven record needed to beat Hillary Rodham Clinton.

headline.main: A Typical American Life, a Very American Death

docs.abstract: Raluca Iosif moved to my neighborhood from Romania harboring dreams of a typical American life; instead, she was shot to death by her ex-boyfriend.
docs.snippet: Raluca Iosif moved to my neighborhood from Romania harboring dreams of a typical American life; instead, she was shot to death by her ex-boyfriend.
